content_summary: The presentation discusses the role of electrophysiology in cellular decision-making during development, such as determining cell positioning. It also explores how bioelectricity can underpin memory and regeneration in large scale circuits, with computational methods and simulations used to model these phenomena. An example of a frog embryo developing its face is given to illustrate these concepts.
